name: refrigerate

effect.scarlet_violet: Turns the bearer's normal-type moves into ice-type moves. Moves changed by this ability have 1.3× their power.
effect.the_teal_mask: Turns the bearer's normal-type moves into ice-type moves. Moves changed by this ability have 1.3× their power.
effect.the_indigo_disk: Turns the bearer's normal-type moves into ice-type moves. Moves changed by this ability have 1.3× their power.

short_effect: Turns the bearer's normal moves into ice moves and strengthens them to 1.3× their power.
